# Project Poster

The Project Poster on VAST Challenge 2021 is designed using R and **[posterdown](https://github.com/brentthorne/posterdown/wiki)** package and it contains the following:

* Issues and Problems

* Motivation

* Approach

* Results

* Future Work

The Project Poster can be viewed in **[html](poster.html)** or **[pdf](PosterDoc/Poster.pdf)** format.
